name: LSAER
description:
[CREDITS]

Game Music:

Menu Music:

Made for the Dungeon Crawler 2023 Game Jam. Slightly rushed. The duality is 2D to 3D, as you control the 3D with 2D, but its a scrappy idea cause I had nothing else that I saw as worth working on.

The way to play is to get the 2D player to the sections that will move or rotate the player, then when you are in line with the drone, you can shoot.

If there's any bugs let me know.
